bestIdea.name: The Sprawl of Neo-Tokyo
bestIdea.description: Explore the sprawling, neon-lit streets of Neo-Tokyo, a cityscape filled with towering skyscrapers, bustling markets, and hidden alleyways. Navigate through the high-tech districts and experience the cyber-enhanced culture of this futuristic metropolis.

otherIdeas.name: The Streets of Night City
otherIdeas.description: Traverse the gritty and vibrant streets of Night City, a hub of cybernetic enhancements and corporate intrigue. From the bustling city center to the shadowy outskirts, experience the diverse districts and their unique cultures.

otherIdeas.name: The Megacity of New Angeles
otherIdeas.description: Journey through New Angeles, a megacity where technology and humanity intersect. From the towering corporate skyscrapers to the vibrant street markets, explore the diverse environments and cultures of this futuristic urban landscape.
